sect1.title: ENUM

row.entry: The numeric value type of the values. If omitted, defaults to UNSIGNED4.
The label of the enumerated value.
The numeric value to associate with the name. If omitted, the value is the previous value plus one (1). If all values are omitted, the enumeration starts with one (1).

sect1.para: The ENUM declaration specifies constant values to make code more readable.
